attributes.action: Revenue from parking fines to be put in a regional fund to build nw social Housing
attributes.additional_details:
My name is Robert Stewart, a 32 year Unemployed man who lives in East Sussex.
I'am a proud British citizen , who belives in social justice . My proposel is that all revenues generated by parking fines should be placed in a local fund to build social housing, and also unemployed people should be involved in the training to gain careers in the building industry.
You can gain the figures from your local authority, under the freedom of information act, about howmuch they really generate from parking fines.
So to all fellow Bristish citizen who care care about there country please sigh the petition and see if we can make a change.
